snippet: At least 45 Tibetans have set themselves on fire since February 2009, according to an estimate by Radio Free Asia.
abstract: Tibetan woman Dolkar Kyi kills herself through self-immolation at a monastery in a Tibetan area of China; nearly 50 Tibetans have set fire to themselves since 2009 in what appear to be protests against Chinese rule.
lead_paragraph: At least 45 Tibetans have set themselves on fire since February 2009, according to an estimate by Radio Free Asia.

headline.seo: Tibetan Woman Dies in Western China Blaze, Reports Say
headline.main: Tibetan Woman Dies in Western China Blaze, Reports Say
